title: Crates

codeExamples.title: Library Crate
codeExamples.explanation: A library crate (lib.rs) contains reusable code. The pub keyword makes it available to other crates.

codeExamples.title: Documentation
codeExamples.explanation: The /// comments generate documentation. The cargo doc command creates HTML documentation. The ``` code blocks contain examples.

codeExamples.title: Re-export
codeExamples.explanation: pub use allows us to make an internal module function directly accessible in the crate API. This results in a simpler API.
